metadata.title: CVE-2018-0493 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: remctld in remctl before 3.14, when an attacker is authorized to execute a command that uses the sudo option, has a use-after-free that leads to a daemon crash, memory corruption, or arbitrary command execution.

criterions.comment: remctl package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.13-1+deb9u1').
